name: use-toggle
title: useToggle
description: Custom hook that manages a boolean toggle state in React components. a function to toggle the state, and a function to set the state explicitly. ```tsx const [isToggled, toggle, setToggle] = useToggle(); // Initial value is false // OR const [isToggled, toggle, setToggle] = useToggle(true); // Initial value is true // Use isToggled in your component, toggle to switch the state, setToggle to set the state explicitly. ```
